children.text: The tile unit in this area has been cut and installed in multiple pieces, where a single piece of tile could easily have been installed, which looks poorly finished and should be replaced with the properly cut and fitted tile.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 3958.1 Installation of Ceramic Tiles, clause 5.4.2.4 Placement of Cuts states that
‘Where possible, cuts should not be smaller than half size and all cuts should be made on the perimeter of the job’
‘Do not install single tiles in more than one piece unless no alternative is possible’ .
This tile unit should be properly replaced in accordance with above.
